description:
This Stunning four-bedroom + study Coral build family home provides the opportunity to live in a modern and contemporary home offering multiple areas to enjoy your own space or entertain in style being family-oriented, this home will impress from all aspects.

The open-plan kitchen/dining/lounge room layout seamlessly connects to the alfresco, perfect for gatherings with friends and family. The master retreat is situated on its own end of the house and is complete with a huge walk-in robe and ensuite.

Privately positioned towards the rear of the home, are three bedrooms with built in robes, main bathroom, and separate toilet. Adding to the long list of incredible features of this home, is the perfect outdoor alfresco area which overlooks the resort style in ground pool.

Property features:

- Amazing parents retreat, walk-in robe, and ensuite

-Private study; perfect for working from home.

- Modern well-designed kitchen with excellent storage, an abundance of bench space, glass splash back, a 4 burner gas cooktop, and a large walk-in pantry.

- Open floor plan ideal for entertaining designed to flow effortlessly connecting kitchen, living, dining and outdoor zones.

- Snuggle up in the winter with a combustion fireplace and feel comfort year-round with ducted air-conditioning system.

- Simply stunning in-ground pool saltwater pool with water feature off the large outdoor entertaining area.

- Set on 760 m2 block, all fully fenced for the kids & pets to play.

-13.5kw solar system producing great energy savings

-Single colorbond shed at rear of yard with access for motorbikes and lawncare

- Close to Heddon Greta shops, golf course, Hunter Expressway, just 5 mins to Kurri Kurri

Contact Samantha today on 0423 682 959 to arrange your inspection.

*Whilst all care has been taken preparing this advertisement and the information contained herein has been obtained from sources, we believe to be reliable, PRDnationwide Hunter Valley does not warrant, represent or guarantee the accuracy, adequacy, or completeness of the information.
PRDnationwide Hunter Valley accepts no liability for any loss or damage (whether caused by negligence or not) resulting from reliance on this information, and potential purchasers should make their own investigations before purchasing.
